channel.title: The start of a Mailing system for private servers
channel.description:
this is a really crappy basic first copy but what it its for is lets say you want to message someone offline well now you can this is a very basic beta you can check out on my server ssrsc.no-ip.org (silabscape) now the commands are really crappy and by the time you read this will probly have changed and also for the time you can only have 1 message at a time But! if you want to check it out your first step is to type
::send "playername"
then it will tell you to type ::msg "and the message"
now if you want to see if you have a message you can type
::read
some side notes:
no you cannot send yourself a message!
and just to show its real heres a few screenshots of version beta 1
[img]http://upload-image.com/image/mzZ85879.bmp[/img]
[img]http://upload-image.com/image/CZr85887.bmp[/img]
